thumb.title: At dawn / ことP feat. Feng Yi
thumb.description: Vo. Feng YiMusic, lyrics, Arranged by Koto-P真っ黒投稿祭https://twipla.jp/events/637145---------------------------At dawnThe air at dawnThe light of DawnA new day beginsdifferent from yesterdayMy heart swellsA new story beginningPainful and sad, just leave it behindJust forgetThrow away the burdens of my heartLighten my mindAnger and hate, just leave it behindJust forgetThrow away the worries in my heartFreeing my mindThe sky at dawnThe song of DawnA new me beginsDifferent from the past daysBright spring in my stepA new journey beginningPainful and sad, just leave it behindJust forgetThrow away the burdens of my heartLighten my mindAnger and hate, just leave it behindJust forgetThrow away the worries in my heartFreeing my mind---------------------------
